com.unitedcaterers.server
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  com.unitedcaterers.server.Request
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class wraps the action (method name) and the parameters into an object which is serialized and sent to the server. The server unserializes the object and calls the method indicated by action using reflection.

See Also:
